9.title: Home
9.content: I am a scientist interested in auditory/vestibular hair cell function, craniofacial genetics and developmental biology. µCT scan rendering of a mouse tympanic bulla. Paracoronal sections reveal the cavity containing the cochlea, labeled in purple. Incus, yellow. Malleus, blue. Stapes, red.
